SYN_2_7_1909:
[Indication]
Large pleural effusion / Decompensated CHF.
[Anesthesia]
10 mL Lidocaine 1%.
[Description]
Ultrasound visualized a large anechoic effusion on the Right. A 14Fr catheter was placed percutaneously. 1850 mL of serous fluid was drained.
[Plan]
Fluid analysis. Monitor electrolytes post-drainage.
